atk-s0511a4:1_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati parinibbute tassa sāsanaṁ vassasatasahassaṁ pavattittha.
atk-s0511a4:1_1: Atha buddhānubuddhānaṁ sāvakānaṁ antaradhānena sāsanampissa antaradhāyi. Athassa
atk-s0511a4:1_2: aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā ekasmiṁ kappe koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0511a4:1_3: So pana bhagavā soḷasaasaṅkhyeyyaṁ kappānañca satasahassaṁ pāramiyo pūretvā bodhiñāṇaṁ
atk-s0511a4:1_4: paripācetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhatvā tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a4:1_5: tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā devatānaṁ paṭiññaṁ datvā tusitapurato cavitvā rammavatīnagare
atk-s0511a4:1_6: sunandassa nāma rañño kule sujātāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a4:1_7: Tassapi paṭisandhikkhaṇe dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṁse vuttappakārāni dvattiṁsa pāṭihāriyāni
atk-s0511a4:1_8: nibbattiṁsu. So devatāhi katārakkhasaṁvidhāno dasannaṁ māsānaṁ accayena mātukucchito
atk-s0511a4:1_9: nikkhamitvā sabbasattuttaro uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā ca disā
atk-s0511a4:1_10: viloketvā āsabhiṁ vācaṁ nicchāresi – “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa,
atk-s0511a4:1_11: seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
atk-s0511a4:2_0: Tato kumārassa nāmakaraṇadivase nāmaṁ karontā “koṇḍañño”ti nāmamakaṁsu. So hi bhagavā
atk-s0511a4:2_1: koṇḍaññagotto ahosi. Tassa kira tayo pāsādā ahesuṁ – rāma, surāma, subhanāmakā paramaramaṇīyā.
atk-s0511a4:2_2: Tesu tīṇi satasahassāni nāṭakitthīnaṁ naccagītavāditakusalānaṁ sabbakālaṁ paccupaṭṭhitāni
atk-s0511a4:2_3: ahesuṁ. Tassa rucidevī nāma aggamahesī ahosi. Vijitaseno nāmassa putto ahosi. So
atk-s0511a4:3_0: So pana jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvā ājaññarathena nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā dasa
atk-s0511a4:3_1: māse padhānacariyaṁ cari. Koṇḍaññakumāraṁ pana pabbajantaṁ dasa janakoṭiyo anupabbajiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:3_2: So tehi parivuto dasa māse padhānacariyaṁ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sunandagāme samasahitaghanapayodharāya
atk-s0511a4:3_3: yasodharāya nāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṁ paramamadhuraṁ madhupāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā phalapallavaṅkurasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a4:3_4: sālavane divāvihāraṁ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye gaṇaṁ pahāya sunandakājīvakena dinnā
atk-s0511a4:3_5: aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā sālakalyāṇirukkhaṁ tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pubbadisābhāgaṁ
atk-s0511a4:3_6: oloketvā bodhirukkhaṁ piṭṭhito katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ santharitvā
atk-s0511a4:3_7: pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya mārabalaṁ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0511a4:3_8: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ visodhetvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṁ visodhetvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0511a4:3_9: paccayākāraṁ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā
atk-s0511a4:3_10: udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0511a4:3_11: cattāri maggañāṇāni cattāri ca phalañāṇāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṁ
atk-s0511a4:3_12: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṁ cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0511a4:7: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhataṁ;
atk-s0511a4:12: Paññāpetuṁ gatī natthi, pattānaṁ acalaṁ sukha”nti. –
atk-s0511a4:13_0: Evaṁ udānaṁ udānetvā sattasattāhaṁ bodhimūleyeva phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a4:13_1: aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno ajjhesanaṁ paṭicca – “kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0511a4:13_2: deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā saddhiṁ pabbajitā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo addasa. “Ime
atk-s0511a4:13_3: pana kulaputtā samupacitakusalamūlā maṁ pabbajantaṁ anupabbajitā mayā saddhiṁ padhānaṁ
atk-s0511a4:13_4: caritvā maṁ upaṭṭhahiṁsu, handāhaṁ imesaṁ sabbapaṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya”nti evaṁ
atk-s0511a4:13_5: upadhāretvā – “idāni pana te kattha vasantī”ti olokento – “ito aṭṭhārasayojanike
atk-s0511a4:13_6: arundhavatīnagare devavane viharantī”ti disvā – “tesaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a4:13_7: pattacīvaramādāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ
atk-s0511a4:13_8: vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya, evameva bodhimūle antarahito devavane pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a4:14_0: Tasmiñca samaye tā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo arundhavatīnagaraṁ upanissāya devavane viharanti.
atk-s0511a4:14_1: Te pana bhikkhū dasabalaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānasā paccuggantvā,
atk-s0511a4:14_2: bhagavato pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā, buddhāsanaṁ paññāpetvā, satthu gāravaṁ katvā,
atk-s0511a4:14_3: bhagavantaṁ vanditvā, parivāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Tatra koṇḍañño dasabalo munigaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a4:14_4: buddhāsane nisinno tidasagaṇaparivuto dasasatanayano viya vimalagaganatalagato saradasamayarajanikaro
atk-s0511a4:14_5: viya tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocittha. Atha satthā tesaṁ sabbabuddhanisevitaṁ
atk-s0511a4:14_6: anuttaraṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṁ kathetvā dasabhikkhukoṭippamukhā
atk-s0511a4:27_0: Tattha dīpaṅkarassa aparenāti dīpaṅkarassa satthuno aparabhāgeti attho. Koṇḍañño
atk-s0511a4:27_1: nāmāti attano gottavasena samadhigatanāmadheyyo. Nāyakoti vināyako. Anantatejoti
atk-s0511a4:27_2: attano sīlaguṇañāṇapuññatejena anantatejo. Heṭṭhato avīci upari bhavaggaṁ tiriyato
atk-s0511a4:27_3: anantā lokadhātuyo etthantare ekapuggalopi tassa mukhaṁ oloketvā ṭhātuṁ samattho
atk-s0511a4:27_4: nāma natthi. Tena vuttaṁ “anantatejo”ti. Amitayasoti anantaparivāro. Tassa hi bhagavato
atk-s0511a4:27_5: vassasatasahassāni yāva parinibbānasamayaṁ etthantare bhikkhuparisāya gaṇanaparicchedo
atk-s0511a4:27_6: nāma nāhosi. Tasmā “amitayaso”ti vuccati. Amitaguṇakittipi “amitayaso”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a4:28: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṁ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0511a4:29: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a4:30: Tasmā appameyyaguṇagaṇattā “appameyyo”ti vuccati. Durāsadoti durupasaṅkamanīyo, āsajja ghaṭṭetvā upasaṅkamitumasakkuṇeyyabhāvato durāsado, durabhibhavanīyoti attho.
atk-s0511a4:31_2: vuccati. Sīlena sāgarūpamoti sīlasaṁvarena velānātikkamanabhāvena sāgarasamo. “Mahāsamuddo,
atk-s0511a4:31_3: bhikkhave, ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattatī”ti hi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0511a4:32_1: samo, sadisoti attho. Merugirivaro viya thiratarasarīroti vā. Ñāṇena gaganūpamoti
atk-s0511a4:32_2: ettha bhagavato ñāṇassa anantabhāvena anantākāsena upamā katā. Cattāri anantāni vuttāni
atk-s0511a4:34: Buddhañāṇaṁ appameyyaṁ, na sakkā ete vijānitu”nti. ;
atk-s0511a4:35: Tasmā anantassa ñāṇassa anantena ākāsena upamā katāti.
atk-s0511a4:36_1: gahaṇena satipaṭṭhānasammappadhāniddhipādāpi gahitāva honti. Tasmā indriyādīnaṁ catusaṅkhepānaṁ
atk-s0511a4:36_2: vasena sattattiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ pakāsanadhammaṁ pakāsesi, desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a4:37_0: Tato aparabhāge mahāmaṅgalasamāgame dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatāyo sukhume attabhāve
atk-s0511a4:37_1: māpetvā imasmiññeva cakkavāḷe sannipatiṁsu. Tattha kira aññataro devaputto koṇḍaññadasabalaṁ
atk-s0511a4:37_2: maṅgalapañhaṁ pucchi. Tassa bhagavā maṅgalāni kathesi. Tattha navutikoṭisahassāni
atk-s0511a4:37_3: arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu. Sotāpannādīnaṁ gaṇanaparicchedo nāma nāhosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a4:41_0: Tattha tato parampīti tato aparabhāgepi. Desenteti bhagavati dhammaṁ desente. Naramarūnanti
atk-s0511a4:41_1: narānañceva amarānañca, yadā pana bhagavā gaganatale titthiyamānamaddanaṁ yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ
atk-s0511a4:41_2: karonto dhammaṁ desesi tadā asītikoṭisahassāni arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu. Tīsu phalesu
atk-s0511a4:45: Tattha tadā-saddaṁ ānetvā attho daṭṭhabbo. Yadā bhagavā dhammaṁ desesi, tadā asītikoṭisahassānaṁ dhammābhisamayo ahūti.
atk-s0511a4:46_0: Koṇḍañño kira satthā abhisambodhiṁ patvā paṭhamavassaṁ candavatīnagaraṁ upanissāya
atk-s0511a4:46_1: candārāme vihāsi. Tattha sucindharassa nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto bhaddamāṇavo
atk-s0511a4:46_2: nāma yasodharabrāhmaṇassa putto subhaddamāṇavo ca koṇḍaññassa buddhassa sammukhā
atk-s0511a4:46_3: dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pasannamānasā dasahi māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṁ tassa santike
atk-s0511a4:47_0: Atha koṇḍañño satthā jeṭṭhamāsapuṇṇamāya subhaddattherappamukhena koṭisatasahassena
atk-s0511a4:47_1: parivuto pātimokkhamuddisi, so paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Tato aparabhāge koṇḍaññasatthuno
atk-s0511a4:47_2: putte vijitasene nāma arahattaṁ patte taṁpamukhassa koṭisahassassa majjhe bhagavā
atk-s0511a4:47_3: pātimokkhaṁ uddisi, so dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Athāparena samayena dasabalo janapadacārikaṁ
atk-s0511a4:47_4: caranto udenarājānaṁ nāma navutikoṭijanaparivāraṁ pabbājesi saddhiṁ tāya parisāya.
atk-s0511a4:47_5: Tasmiṁ pana arahattaṁ patte taṁpamukhehi navutiyā arahantakoṭīhi bhagavā parivuto
atk-s0511a4:47_6: pātimokkhaṁ uddisi, so tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a4:54_0: Tadā kira amhākaṁ bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā candavatīnagare paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a4:54_1: So kira anekanaravaraparivuto salilanidhinivasanaṁ sameruyugandharaṁ aparimitavasudharaṁ
atk-s0511a4:54_2: vasundharaṁ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena paripāleti. Atha koṇḍañño buddhopi koṭisatasahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto
atk-s0511a4:55_0: So vijitāvī kira rājā – “sammāsambuddho kira amhākaṁ nagaraṁ anuppatto”ti sutvā paccuggantvā
atk-s0511a4:55_1: bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṁ saṁvidahitvā svātanāya saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena nimantetvā
atk-s0511a4:55_2: punadivase bhattavidhiṁ suṭṭhu paṭiyādetvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a4:55_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṁ adāsi. Bodhisatto bhagavantaṁ bhojetvā anumodanāvasāne
atk-s0511a4:55_4: – “bhante, temāsaṁ mahājanasaṅgahaṁ karonto idheva vasathā”ti yācitvā tayo māse nirantaraṁ
atk-s0511a4:56_0: Atha satthā bodhisattaṁ – “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā dhammamassa
atk-s0511a4:56_1: desesi. So satthu dhammakathaṁ sutvā rajjaṁ niyyātetvā pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā
atk-s0511a4:56_2: aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a4:71: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṁ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a4:99: Tameva atthaṁ sādhento, mahārajjaṁ jine adaṁ;
atk-s0511a4:107_0: Tattha ahaṁ tena samayenāti ahaṁ tasmiṁ samaye. Vijitāvī nāmāti evaṁnāmako cakkavattirājā
atk-s0511a4:107_1: ahosiṁ. Samuddaṁ antamantenāti ettha cakkavāḷapabbataṁ sīmaṁ mariyādaṁ katvā ṭhitaṁ
atk-s0511a4:107_2: samuddaṁ antaṁ katvā issariyaṁ vattayāmīti attho. Ettāvatā na pākaṭaṁ hoti.
atk-s0511a4:108_0: Rājā kira cakkavattī cakkaratanānubhāvena vāmapassena sineruṁ katvā samuddassa uparibhāgena
atk-s0511a4:108_1: aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṁ pubbavidehaṁ gacchati. Tattha rājā cakkavattī – “pāṇo
atk-s0511a4:108_2: na hantabbo, adinnaṁ nādātabbaṁ, kāmesumicchā na caritabbā, musā na bhāsitabbā, majjaṁ
atk-s0511a4:108_3: na pātabbaṁ, yathābhuttañca bhuñjathā”ti ovādaṁ deti. Evaṁ ovāde dinne taṁ cakkaratanaṁ
atk-s0511a4:108_4: vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā puratthimaṁ samuddaṁ ajjhogāhati. Yathā yathā ca taṁ ajjhogāhati,
atk-s0511a4:108_5: tathā tathā saṁkhittaūmivipphāraṁ hutvā ogacchamānaṁ mahāsamuddasalilaṁ yojanamattaṁ
atk-s0511a4:108_6: oggantvā antosamuddaṁ ubhosu passesu veḷuriyamaṇibhitti viya paramadassanīyaṁ hutvā
atk-s0511a4:108_7: tiṭṭhati, evaṁ puratthimasāgarapariyantaṁ gantvā taṁ cakkaratanaṁ paṭinivattati.
atk-s0511a4:108_8: Paṭinivattamāne ca tasmiṁ sā parisā aggato hoti, majjhe rājā cakkavattī ante cakkaratanaṁ
atk-s0511a4:108_9: hoti. Tampi jalaṁ jalantena viyogaṁ asahamānamiva nemimaṇḍalapariyantaṁ abhihanantameva tīramupagacchati.
atk-s0511a4:109_0: Evaṁ rājā cakkavattī puratthimasamuddapariyantaṁ pubbavidehaṁ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddapariyantaṁ
atk-s0511a4:109_1: jambudīpaṁ vijetukāmo cakkaratanadesitena maggena dakkhiṇasamuddābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0511a4:109_2: Taṁ dasasahassayojanappamāṇaṁ jambudīpaṁ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddato paccuttaritvā
atk-s0511a4:109_3: sattayojanasahassappamāṇaṁ aparagoyānaṁ vijetuṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva gantvā tampi
atk-s0511a4:109_5: uttarakuruṁ vijetuṁ tatheva gantvā taṁ samuddapariyantaṁ katvā tatheva abhivijiya
atk-s0511a4:109_6: uttarasamuddatopi paccuttarati. Ettāvatā raññā cakkavattinā sāgarapariyantāya pathaviyā
atk-s0511a4:109_7: issariyaṁ adhigataṁ hoti. Tena vuttaṁ samuddaṁ antamantena, issariyaṁ vattayāmaha”nti.
atk-s0511a4:110_0: Koṭisatasahassānanti koṭisatasahassāni. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Vimalānanti khīṇāsavānaṁ.
atk-s0511a4:110_1: Saha lokagganāthenāti saddhiṁ dasabalena koṭisatasahassānanti attho. Paramannenāti
atk-s0511a4:110_2: paṇītena annena. Tappayinti tappesiṁ. Aparimeyyito kappeti ito paṭṭhāya satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0511a4:110_3: tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā ekasmiṁ bhaddakappeti attho.
atk-s0511a4:111_0: Padhānanti vīriyaṁ. Tameva atthaṁ sādhentoti tameva buddhakārakamatthaṁ dānapāramiṁ
atk-s0511a4:111_1: pūrento sādhento nipphādentoti attho. Mahārajjanti cakkavattirajjaṁ. Jineti bhagavati,
atk-s0511a4:111_2: sampadānatthe vā bhummaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Adanti adāsiṁ. Evamatthaṁ sādhentoti iminā sambandho
atk-s0511a4:111_3: daṭṭhabbo. “Mahārajjaṁ jine dadi”nti paṭhanti keci. Daditvānāti cajitvā. Suttantanti
atk-s0511a4:111_4: suttantapiṭakaṁ. Vinayanti vinayapiṭakaṁ. Navaṅganti suttageyyādinavaṅgaṁ. Sobhayiṁ
atk-s0511a4:111_5: jinasāsananti āgamādhigamehi lokiyehi samalaṅkariṁ. Tatthāti tassa bhagavato sāsane.
atk-s0511a4:111_6: Appamattoti satisampanno. Brahmalokamagañchahanti brahmalokaṁ agañchiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0511a4:112_0: Imassa pana koṇḍaññabuddhassa rammavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi, sunando nāma rājā pitā,
atk-s0511a4:112_1: sujātā nāma devī mātā, bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā, anuruddho nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a4:112_2: tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā, sālakalyāṇirukkho bodhi, aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṁ
atk-s0511a4:112_3: sarīraṁ, vassasatasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi, tassa rucidevī nāma aggamahesī ahosi,
atk-s0511a4:112_4: vijitaseno nāmassa putto, cando nāmupaṭṭhāko rājā. Candārāme kira vasīti. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a4:127: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a4:130: Yathā hi gaganamuḷūbhi, evaṁ so upasobhatha.
atk-s0511a4:135: “Sā ca atuliyā jinassa iddhi, ñāṇaparibhāvito ca samādhi;
atk-s0511a4:137_0: Tattha sālakalyāṇikoti sālakalyāṇirukkho, so buddhakāle ceva cakkavattikāle ca nibbattati,
atk-s0511a4:137_1: nāññadā. So ekāheneva uṭṭhāti kira. Khīṇāsavehi vimalehi, vicittā āsi medanīti ayaṁ
atk-s0511a4:137_2: medanī khīṇāsavehi ekakāsāvapajjotā vicittā paramadassanīyā ahosi. Yathāhīti opammatthe
atk-s0511a4:137_3: nipāto. Uḷūbhīti nakkhattehi, tārāgaṇehi gaganatalaṁ viya khīṇāsavehi vicittā ayaṁ
atk-s0511a4:138_0: Asaṅkhobhāti aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akkhobhā avikārā. Vijjupātaṁva dassetvāti vijjupātaṁ
atk-s0511a4:138_1: viya dassayitvā, “vijjuppātaṁvā”tipi pāṭho. Koṇḍaññabuddhassa kira kāle parinibbāyamānā
atk-s0511a4:138_3: samantato vijjotamānā tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā nirupādānā dahanā viya parinibbāyiṁsu.
atk-s0511a4:138_4: Tena vuttaṁ “vijjupātaṁva dassetvā”ti. Atuliyāti atulyā asadisā. Ñāṇaparibhāvitoti
atk-s0511a4:138_5: ñāṇena vaḍḍhito. Sesagāthā heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānā evāti.
atk-s0511a4:141: “Na heva dhātuyo tassa, satthuno, vikiriṁsu tā;
atk-s0511a4:143: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgantvā sattayojanikaṁ sattaratanamayaṁ haritālamanosilāya mattikākiccaṁ telasappīhi udakakiccaṁ katvā niṭṭhāpesunti.
